item.title: Hello Guys, I Have a T2 Error when connecting
item.dc:creator: @Airo_HNTD Airo HNTD
item.description:
@Airo_HNTD wrote:

Hi guys, I just recently searched an error like mine. It was a T2 error. I’ve used moparscape on a server of mine before and it was fine. But for this one as soon as I log in, I get this error message:

Error: T2 - 126,126,126 - 13,3088,3500 - 80,111,105,110,116,115,58,32,48,32,10,76,-59,

After researching a little, I’ve narrowed it down to probably being Frame126.

[code]public void playersOnline_and_Uptime() {
sendFrame126("@red@Players online: @gre@"+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount()+" !", 7332);
sendFrame126("@red@Minutes online: @gre@"+ (server.uptime / 2 / 60) +"", 7333);
}
public int[] lowTask = { 87, 100, 19, 1267, 181, 90, 112, 117, 78, 1153 };
public int[] mediumTask = { 87, 100, 19, 1267, 117, 78, 941, 1338, 912, 913, 914, 2591,

2604, 2610, 1153, 1154 };
public int[] highTask = { 1627, 181, 90, 112, 117, 78, 1183, 941, 2881, 2882, 2883, 2591,

2604, 2610, 1153, 1154 };
public int taskID = -1;
public static int Waiters = 0;
public boolean waited;
public int pkPoints = 0;
public int donorPoints = 0;
public int hween09 = 0;
public boolean logoutButton;
public boolean hasAccepted = false;
public int taskAmount = -1;
public boolean isBK = false;
public boolean isBT = false;
public boolean isBA = false;
public boolean isBD = false;
public boolean isBV = false;
public boolean isBG = false;
private long delay01 = 0;[/code]

That’s the part of the code I think the problem is in, I can’t see anything in there that seems wrong but my Java knowledge isn’t great.

Any ideas? Or am I looking in the wrong part?

Read full topic
